explanation: [0-0] A man with blue-green and gray hair stands in front of a glass door, wearing a black T-shirt and red pants, holding a yellow and black hose nozzle. Behind him, lush greenery can be seen.

[0-6] He turns the nozzle towards the camera, and a burst of water erupts, obscuring the view. The perspective shifts behind the man, who is watering the plants below with a watering gun. Then, the perspective moves to the bottom of the courtyard, where the floor is black and the surrounding walls are white. There are some green plants and a small tree on the ground. As the perspective pans, the water sprayed from the watering gun falls like light rain.

[6-14] Then the camera turns, and the man is standing on a glass platform, spraying water upward. Immediately afterward, the camera zooms out to reveal a panoramic view of the courtyard. The camera angle changes again, revealing the man from a low angle. He is standing on a balcony with glass railings, continuing to spray water from above onto the courtyard below with the watering gun. Subsequently, the man sits on the platform next to the balcony and waters. The wall below the man is brown. Finally, the camera pans to give a perspective of the small tree.
